protein.specific_function: Voltage-gated calcium channel that plays a central role in sperm cell hyperactivation. Controls calcium entry to mediate the hyperactivated motility, a step needed for sperm motility which is essential late in the preparation of sperm for fertilization. Activated by intracellular alkalinization

reference.reference_text: Quill TA, Ren D, Clapham DE, Garbers DL: A voltage-gated ion channel expressed specifically in spermatozoa. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2001 Oct 23;98(22):12527-31.
